metas.name: Fureru.
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Supernatural Tags:Coming of Age Fureru is a coming-of-age film set in present-day Tokyo, centering on childhood friends who find a creature with mysterious powers that pushes them to discover the bonds that tie the three students together.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

metas.name: 30-sai made Doutei da to Mahou Tsukai ni Nareru Rashii: Tokubetsu-hen
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Romance, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Boys' Love Movie compiling 30-sai made Doutei da to Mahou Tsukai ni Nareru Rashii which also has new footage content not in the TV anime.

metas.name: Fuuto Tantei: Kamen Rider Skull no Shouzou
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Mystery, Supernatural Tags:Tokusatsu/Henshin/Detective What happened to Shotarou, Phillip, and Sokichi Narumi on the night "Kamen Rider W" was born?.....

An adaptation of Fuuto P.I. volume #6, which is a extended version of the "Begins' Night" chapter from the original Live-Action series.

metas.name: Ganbatte Ikimasshoi
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Sports Tags:Full CGI/School Club/Female Protagonist/Primarily Teen Cast/Primarily Female Cast A high-school girl, Etsuko, just spends her days without any aims or purpose, until one day, Riina, a transfer student, asks her help to set up a boat club. Although Etsuko reluctantly accepts after hearing Riina speak passionately about her dream, she gradually starts to embrace the club after spending time with her teammates.

(Source: Annecy Festival)

metas.name: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Movie
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Music Tags:Band/Primarily Female Cast Compilation films of BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!

metas.name: Genjitsu no Yohane: SUNSHINE in the MIRROR Movie
metas.description: Genres: Fantasy, Music, Slice of Life Tags: Theatrical compilation of Genjitsu no Yohane: Sunshine in the Mirror announced during the Love Live! Sunshine! Aqours 9th Anniversary Project Presentation.

metas.name: Inazuma Eleven: Soushuuhen - Densetsu no Kickoff
metas.description: Genres: Action, Sports Tags: Compilation film of Inazuma Eleven; a recap of the original video game and the first 26 episodes of the series which focuses on the matches.

metas.name: PUI PUI Molcar the Movie MOLMAX
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy Tags:CGI/Artificial Intelligence/Cars/Animals The story begins with the emergence of the first high-tech molcar in Molcity, with drivers beginning to ride state-of-the-art AI-driven Molcars. Potato and friends get involved in a chase between a mysterious organization and a Molcar AI named Cannon, and are saved by a talented driver. Potato finds out that the driver is in search of his missing Molcar, and gets the idea to use Cannon's AI functionality to help with the search.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

Note: Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.

metas.name: Gintama on Theater 2D: Kintama-hen
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi
Tags:
Theatrical cut of the Kintama Arc (episodes 253-256). The movie is a part of the "Gintama 20th Anniversary Project".

metas.name: Inazuma Eleven: Aratanaru Eiyuutachi no Joshou
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Sports
Tags:Football
Adaptation of the prologue of "Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road" video game.
